"Sweeten the deal" - A phrase used to convince someone to accept a proposal or offer.
"Aage of sweets" - A reference to a time when people were more innocent and naive, often associated with youth and childhood.
"Sweetheart" - A term of endearment used to express affection towards someone.
"Sweet" - A phrase used to describe a person who is always in a good mood and has a positive outlook on life.
"Sweet revenge" - A phrase used to describe a situation where someoneages another personlessly.
